jokes: Why did the chicken cross the road?
To get to the other side!
Why can't cats use a computer?
Because they're always chasing the mouse!
What did the fish say when he swam into the wall?
Dam.
Did you hear about the Italian chef?
He pasta-way!
Did you hear about the guy who invented knock-knock jokes?
He won the no-bell prize!
How do you get a squirrel to like you?
Act like a nut.
I don't trust stairs.
They're always up to something...
Why did the scarecrow win an award?
Because he was outstanding in his field!
I made a pencil with two erasers!
It was pointless.
What do you call an elephant that doesn't matter?
~~Your mom~~ Irrelephant!

1_15./deop <player>: Revokes operator status from a player.
1_15./time <add|query|set> <value>: Changes or queries the world's game time.
1_15./reload: Reloads loot tables, advancements, and functions from disk.
1_15./tellraw <player> <raw json message>: Displays a JSON message to players.
1_15./forceload add <x1> <z1> [<x2> <z2>]: Forces a chunk to be constantly loaded.
1_15./setblock: Changes a block to another block. [See official documentation](/schedule clear <function>)
1_15./me <action>: Displays a message about the sender.
1_15./fill <x1> <y1> <z1> <x2> <y2> <z2> <blo: Fills a region with a specific block.
1_15./worldborder: Manages the world border. [See official documentation](/worldborder)
1_15./gamerule <rule name> [value]: Sets or queries a game rule value.
1_15./data: Gets, merges, modifies and removes block entity and entity NBT data. [See official documentation](https://minecraft.gamepedia.com/Commands/data)
1_15./forceload query [<x1> <z1>]: Tells you if specified chunk is force-loaded.
1_15./loot <target> <source>: Drops itesm from an inventory slot onto the ground.
1_15./advancement: Gives, removes, or checks player advancements. [See offical documentation.](https://minecraft.gamepedia.com/Commands/advancement)
1_15./say <message>: Displays a message to multiple players.
1_15./spectate [target] [player]: Make one player in spectator mode spectate an entity.
1_15./clone <x1> <y1> <z1> <x2> <y2> <z2> <x>: Copies blocks from one place to another.
1_15./debug (start|stop|report): Starts or stops a debugging session.
1_15./op <player>: Grants operator status to a player.
1_15./schedule function <function> <time> [ap: Delays the execution of a function.
1_15./tell or /msg or /w <player> <message>: Displays a private message to other players.
1_15./give <player> <item>[<NBT>] [<count>]: Gives an item to a player.
1_15./teammsg <message>: Specifies the message to send to the team.
1_15./setidletimeout <minutes until kick>: Sets the time before idle players are kicked.
1_15./publish [port]: Opens single-player world to local network.
1_15./kick <player> [reason]: Kicks a player off a server
1_15./spawnpoint [<player>] [<x> <y> <z>]: Sets the spawn point for a player.
1_15./trigger <objective> [<add|set> <value>]: Sets a trigger to be activated.
